name: Yeah Jam Fury: U, Me, Everybody!
description: GET THE MANGO! Yeah Jam Fury tests your speed and ingenuity in over 100 levels of smiling face blocks. Utilize all three of your egos to create blocks, scale walls, and destroy everything in the way of your righteous fruit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or later w/ SSE2 capability Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Above Processor: 1.4GHz or Better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended Storage: 1 GB available space
